Report to Valkyon Federation Headquarters

Kulkari aggression has been haltedâ€”for now. No real rationale by their incursion, but the town of Colchester is a complete loss.

Scout Whimnia

Supplemental Info: Despite their proximity to the Valselok Shrine, the kulkaris are not working with the Scions of Lok.Put away the report.
